item.title: Data Communications Management
item.description: BLUF I am not taking a position in DCM as of today. While the stock is cheap in terms of multiples, the company is in the declining printing business and they need a mini-miracle to expand out of it into digital. I do not see a clear path towards a 10 bagger in 5 years. The cannabis labeling business represents only 5% of their revenues despite their market leader position in Canada.
